data.title: Emilia Was Married To Actor Jared Harries in 2005; She Shares A Daughter With Former Partner, Jeremy
data.meta_description: Emilia Fox is one of the iconic figures in the movie industry. She is an English actress who debuted from the movie called The Pianist. She is currently working on TV series The Snow Wolf: A Winter's Tale, The Trial of Christine Keeler, Jack the Ripper- The Case Reopened, Celebrity Juice, Plebs and Celebrity Juice
data.text:
Emilia Fox is one of the iconic figures in the movie industry. She is an English actress who debuted from the movie called The Pianist. She is currently working on TV series The Snow Wolf: A Winter's Tale, The Trial of Christine Keeler, Jack the Ripper- The Case Reopened, Celebrity Juice, Plebs and Celebrity Juice with various characters.

Emilia was born in Hammersmith, London, England on 31st July 1974. Back in 2003 beacause of her great role in Prendimi l'anima, she won Best Actress award in Flaiano Film Festival. Later in 2009, she was nominated in Crime Thriller Awards in the category Best Leading Actress for Silent Witness. Other personalities like Tamsin Egerton, Anthony Byrne, and Lolita Chakrabarti also starred in the following movie.

Current Relationship Status

The 45 years old actress has been linked to many known faces on the show business. Previously, she has been linked to TV chef, Marco Pierre White. In the Mid 2016, the pair get separated but have confirmed that they are still super close.

Currently, She is enjoying her single-hood. In an interview with Daily Mail, she stated that Being single is genuinely positive.

Previously Married to British Actor

Emilia shared her wedding vows with actor Jared Harris who is a son of the legendary Richard Harris in 2005. The pair tied the knot in Emilia's beloved Dorset, beneath a cloud of rare breed butterflies, specially released for the occasion. The pair used to be very happy with each other until 2008.

Harris filed for divorce in January and choose the separated path. Their unsuccessful marriage leads Emilia to have a miscarriage in 2007. The two blissful married life ended and now Jared is happily married to Allegra Riggio.

Daughter with Jeremy Gilley

After a tragic split with Jared, she began dating English actor Jeremy Francis Gilley. According to their closed ones and friends, they seemed the perfect couple. The pair was often seen holding each other hands at glittering showbiz parties in the US and London.

They even founded anti-war charity Peace One Day together. In May 2010, Fox was pregnant with Jeremy's child later in November 2010, she gave birth to a baby girl. The pair named their daughter Rose. After being in a relationship for more than 2 years the couple separated and choose their own path.

The pair never got married to each other. Despite of separation, they are still in touch and are taking care of their daughter.

Past Affairs and Relationship

Being one of the glamours actresses in the Hollywood, she has been attached to many actors. Some of the relationship and affairs which are serious to Emilia are listed below. One of the dramatic relationships of Emilia is with English comedian, artist, musician Vic Reeves.

The couple engaged in 2000 and Emilia moved into Vic's riverside London apartment helping him move into his mock-Tudor country, Manson. The pair seemed to enjoy their life from outside but inside everything was messy.

The twist came after Emilia joined Vic on a double date with Vic's wife and her lesbian lover. Their romantic relation was ended and the engagement has been called off. The pair stated that It was a mutual decision to end the relationship are still good friends.

After the breakup with Vic, she started dating British artist and designer Toby Mott. She met him in mid-1999 while making Randall & Hopkirk. After dating for a couple of years they get separated.

The Net Worth of Emilia Fox

The 45 years old beautiful actress has an estimated net worth of $500,000 which is equal to American singer Sarah Grace. All of her fortunes include the profits from both television, theater, and film roles. Her debut movie, The Pianist was a massive hit and its gross income was $120,072,577 worldwide.

The hardworking actress is still working on various projects and being an experienced actress it is sure that she gets paid a good amount of remuneration. As for now, she is a very proud single mom and living a healthy and prosperous lifestyle.

Family Background and Education

Emilia was raised in Hammersmith, London by thespian family. Her mother is a popular actress Joanna David and father is well known, Edward Fox. Her uncle is an English actor James Fox and Jack Laurence and Lydia are her cousins who are also a well-known artists.

She has half-sister Lucy and has a brother Freddie who is also a well-known actor. Furthermore, her grandfather was Robin Fox who is a theatrical agent and her great grandmother was the actress and great-great-grandfather was a self-made millionaire.

At the beginning she used to play cello at Bryanston School. She learns English from St Catherine's College, Oxford. She can speak German and French and also can play the piano and the trumpet. Additionally, she is a patron of the environmental and human rights charity the Environmental Justice Foundation.

For more information regarding different celebrities please visit Married Celeb.
